## Attributes

|     |     |     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Property** | **Description** | **Type** | **Default** | **Required** |
| direction | Direction of item, including row, row-reverse, column and olumn-reverse. | String | row | No |
| wrap | Sub-elementwrap mode, including nowrap, wrap and rap-reverse. | String | nowrap | No |
| justify | Sub-elementjustify on main axis, including start, end, center, between and around. | String | start | No |
| align | Sub-element justify on cross axis, including start, center, end, baseline and stretch. | String | center | No |
| alignContent | Sub-element justify on multiple axises, including start, end, center, between, around and stretch. | String | stretch | No |

## Flex-item

The flex-item component has a default style flex:1, which ensures all items have equal width. The children of the flex container may not be a flex-item.
